title: Advantech WebAccess/SCADA WADashboard External Control of File Path Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech WebAccess/SCADA. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed.
The specific flaw exists within the WADashboard component. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it to read and execute code from a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of Administrator.
addtionnal_details: Advantech has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-289-01
timeline:
2020-06-19 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-10-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
